statusHistory.reason: Crew existed as children fifty years ago
Most members became Marines after time displacement

keyMoments.title: Sacrifices Ship to Save Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: The Pumpkin Pirates, led by Rapanui, sacrifice the Marine warship Tarielishin to create wind that propels the Going Merry to safety.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's heroism and their friendship with the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Time Travel Identity Revealed
keyMoments.description: The Pumpkin Pirates are revealed to have become Marines after being thrown fifty years into the past by the Rainbow Mist's collapse.
keyMoments.significance: The climactic twist of the arc, explaining the stable time loop.

keyMoments.title: Reunion with Henzo
keyMoments.description: The Pumpkin Pirates reunite with their friend Henzo after fifty years of temporal separation.
keyMoments.significance: Provides emotional closure for the arc and demonstrates the enduring nature of their friendship.

affiliations.description: Most members became Marines after being displaced to the past

reputation: A group of children who pretended to be pirates on Ruluka Island fifty years ago. After being trapped in the Rainbow Mist and displaced to the past, most members became Marines.

keyMoments.title: Escapes the Rainbow Mist
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates successfully navigate the Going Merry out of the collapsing Rainbow Mist dimension.
keyMoments.significance: The crew overcomes another dangerous situation and prepares to continue their journey.

keyMoments.title: Released by Marines
keyMoments.description: The Marine officers (Pumpkin Pirates) choose to let the Straw Hats go free out of gratitude.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the impact of the crew's kindness and heroism.

keyMoments.title: Witnesses Ship from Sky
keyMoments.description: The crew witnesses a massive ship fall from the sky, providing first evidence of Sky Island.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the next arc and validates legends they will pursue.

reputation: Active pirate crew journeying through Paradise
